description.ko: 빛과 중력이 우주적 규모의 구조를 엮어내는, 무한한 우주에 대한 장엄하고도 경외심을 불러일으키는 탐구.
description.en: A majestic and terrifying look into the infinite universe, where light and gravity weave structures of cosmic scale.

prompt: An impossible celestial cathedral formed by the gravitational lensing of a supermassive black hole, with pillars of compressed #3D1A78 starlight and swirling #0D0221 dark matter filaments. Surrounded by a massive event horizon and gas clouds of #7B68EE and #E6E6FA. Cosmic horror majesty on an infinite scale. 8k, hyper-realistic, volumetric gas simulations. Detailed textures of stardust and the silent majesty of the abyss, featuring global illumination from a distant pulsar and raytraced light scattering through the nebula.
